case.title: Pretty full figured lady looking for romance - 35 (SE London)
case.text:
Hello,
I'm fun, funny, creative, full figured, 35 years old, French of African descent looking for a relationship with a gentleman. I love movies, music and I'm curious about a lot of things. I travel a lot on my own or with friends. I love exploring and see what London and the world have to offer. If you're genuine and want to know more send me an email with a picture and we'll take it from there.
NO SCAM OR RUDE MAIL!
